description: Introducing NUI the Natural User Interface, aimed at revolutionizing how people interact with anything digital leveraging the power of AI
title: D-ID | The #1 Choice for AI Generated Video Creation Platform
introduction: D-ID offers a Creative Realityâ„¢ Studio for creating AI videos with interactive agents. The platform provides various plans for different usage needs, including a free trial and commercial options. Users can create digital avatars, control voice pitch and rate, and access premium presenters. The platform also offers AI watermarking and supports multiple languages.
features: Create interactive Agents and real-time AI videos
Up to 135 mins of video or 270 mins of streaming video
Access to AI Presenter PowerPoint add-in
pricing: Subscription based with plans ranging from $35/month to $207.9/month, with annual billing options and discounts up to 30%. Credits are used for video creation, with different credit packages available based on the plan chosen.

faqs.question: What are credits?
faqs.answer: Each credit is worth up to 15 seconds of video. Longer videos consume more credits based on the video length.

faqs.question: What are Agent sessions?
faqs.answer: An Agent session includes up to 5 messages from an agent. Additional messages count as new sessions.

faqs.question: Do unused credits carry over to the next month?
faqs.answer: No, unused credits do not carry over and become void at the end of the month.

faqs.question: How can I change my credit card details?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the 'Billing' section in the menu and update your credit card details.

faqs.question: Why do all videos have a watermark?
faqs.answer: To maintain transparency about the synthetic nature of the videos and adhere to ethical guidelines.
